CVMX_SHARED cvmx_raid_config_t raid_config = {.command_queue_pool = {-1,4096,0} }

Detailed Description

Interface to RAID block.

This is not available on all chips.

Revision
112019

int cvmx_raid_shutdown ( void   ) 

Shutdown the RAID block.

RAID must be idle when this function is called.

Zero on success, negative on failure
